name: acsd-assistant
description: A bot for enhancing your ACSD experience.

scripts.processRestart: pnpm run stop && pnpm run processStart
scripts.start: pnpm run build && pnpm run processStart && pm2 logs
scripts.deploy-start: pnpm run build && pnpm run processStart -- --deploy && pm2 logs
scripts.restart: pnpm run build && pnpm run processRestart && pm2 logs
scripts.deploy-restart: pnpm run build && pnpm run processRestart -- --deploy && pm2 logs
